## Introduction

Using the dataset introduced by *Vera Institute of Justice* about the jails prisons in all counties of the US, we can make the following conclusions 

```{r cars}
print(summary_table)
```


* Most of the jail populations are white and black.

* The US observed an downward trend in the recent years. 

* Most of the jail people are form small/mid cities or towns

* 

# Summary

* Total jail people in recent years:
```{r, echo = FALSE}
print(pull(summary_table$total_pop))
```
